channel.title: Fist script auto talker

item.title: Fist script auto talker
item.dc:creator: @R1ch4y R1ch4y
item.description:
@R1ch4y wrote:

You should use TypeSend instead of SendKeys. Doing this would need you to include SRL.You could also add a random wait. Look below:

[code]program AutoTalkerbyHaxor;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

begin
repeat
TypeSend(‘Place random text here.’);
Wait(1000 + random(1500)); // how many milliseconds you want it to wait before re-typing
until(false); //
end.[code]

Just doing these 2 or 3 changes makes the script a whole lot less detectable.

Hope I helped,
R1ch4.[/code][/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Fist script auto talker
item.dc:creator: @haxorz0wn haxorz0wn
item.description:
@haxorz0wn wrote:

program AutoTalkerbyHaxor;
begin
repeat //
SendKeys(‘Place random text here.’);
Wait(1000);// how many milideconds u want it to wiat b4 re typing
SendKeys(chr(13));
until(false); //
end.

Made by haxorz0wn warning u wil get banned fast using this
